author: pipermerriam
content: The client is now operating in what seems to be a relatively stable manner, doing the "DHT thing" of maintaining the routing table, advertising, looking up, and retrieving content by key.  I've got it exposing a basic JSON-RPC API for convenience.  Like I mentioned, my next two goals are 1) skip graph implementation and 2) exporting metrics from running clients to facilitate the creation of graphana style visuals to inspect the nodes and network.
